title: Oldrich Menhart
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108064037/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108064037/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Oldřich Menhart**

Czechoslovakian designer who made types for [Grafotechna](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108064037/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Grafotechna), including [Manuscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108064037/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Manuscript) & [Figural](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108064037/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Figural).

**Discussion:**  
 [Menhart's Manuscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108064037/http:/typophile.com/node/8491)

**Additional Articles:**  
 [Oldřich Menhart – Calligrapher, Type Designer and Craftsman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108064037/http:/www.typeculture.com/academic_resource/articles_essays/pdfs/tc_article_21.pdf) by [Veronika Burian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108064037/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veronika%20Burian).
author: paul d hunt
